[31]:

j._blob.nu_compton_0=1E15
nu_1=np.logspace(np.log10(j._blob.nu_compton_0),30,1000)
comp_out=np.zeros(1000)
for gamma in np.logspace(1,7,7):
    #print gamma
    for ID,nu_out in enumerate(nu_1):
        j._blob.nu_1=nu_out
        comp_out[ID]=jetkernel.f_compton_K1(j._blob,gamma)
        msk=comp_out>0.0
    plt.plot(np.log10(nu_1[msk]),np.log10(comp_out[msk])-np.log10(comp_out[msk]).max(),label='$\gamma$=%e'%gamma)
    plt.xlabel(r'log( $\nu$ out )  Compotn Hz')
    plt.ylabel('~ redistr prob.')
    plt.legend()
